content:

His teaching skills are outstanding, making complex concepts easy to understand.Working with him has been a transformative experience‚ÄîI have grown immensely in knowledge and skills. His insights, patience, and passion for the field have inspired me to push my limits and explore new possibilities. I sincerely appreciate all the guidance and support he has provided."

title: Become an AI-Native Product Engineer at ProductEngineer.camp
snippet: The rise of artificial intelligence (AI) tools in software development is rapidly setting new expectations for engineers. With AI tools becoming more sophisticated and capable, engineers are now expected to leverage these tools to enhance their work, not just in terms of speed and efficiency but also in terms of broadening their area of responsibilities. - **Continuous delivery of working software** over promises - **Asking why** to understand the customer problem before - **Customer collaboration and feedback** over tickets and
content:
Compared to other offerings, Neon always has a head start and introduces bleeding edge features first.
[Register Today ->](#0)
Become an AI-Native Product Engineer at ProductEngineer.camp
Step into a new era of software development where product thinking meets cutting-edge AI. At ProductEngineer.camp, you won't just learn how to code‚Äîyou'll master the art of building and shipping entire digital products from end to end, backed by the modern Ruby on Rails 8 stack. Our program combines immersive technical training with design thinking, UI/UX fundamentals, and product management essentials, so you can confidently deliver delightful, end-to-end solutions that command salaries of $100k+.
Don't Just Be a Coder, Be a Builder
Picture this: engineers who don't just speak in code but in product design and customer problems.
They're driven by a professional pride and desire to build great products, transcending the traditional developer role to become genuine drivers who go on to put their names behind great products they themselves played a key role in shaping.
Product Engineers embody a holistic approach to engineering, where understanding the entire product and context around it is just as important as the technical skills required to build it. This broad perspective enables them to bridge gaps between different technical domains and ensure that the product serves its customers effectively.
AI: The New Playground
The rise of artificial intelligence (AI) tools in software development is rapidly setting new expectations for engineers. With AI tools becoming more sophisticated and capable, engineers are now expected to leverage these tools to enhance their work, not just in terms of speed and efficiency but also in terms of broadening their area of responsibilities.
Engineers in a post- ChatGPT and GitHub Copilot world are now expected to be able to work in more languages, incorporate more tools and libraries, and simply be able to deliver more, using a broader range of technologies and disciplines in their daily work.
It's probably not a great time to be the platform engineer whose job is to set up Jenkins pipelines for the product teams, when ChatGPT can easily help teams do it themselves.
For Product Engineers however this has unlocked a higher level of abstraction. With AI tools handling more of the routine and specialised tasks, engineers can allocate more time to creative problem-solving, ideation, and exploring new ways to meet customer needs.
This new level of abstraction allows Product Engineers to concentrate on product strategy, user experience, and overall system architecture without being bogged down by the intricacies of individual technologies.
The incorporation of AI into software development encourages a broader perspective, where the choice of technology becomes a means to an end, rather than an end in itself.
While AI didn't create the Product Engineer role (examples have been around for much longer); AI has made becoming a true Product E

title: AI Makerspace | LinkedIn
snippet: üîπ Instruct Lab ‚Äì Hands-on AI model training & customization, empowering builders to fine-tune AI for industry-specific use cases. üîπ Watsonx ‚Äì The future of enterprise AI and responsible AI governance, paving the way for scalable AI adoption. ‚ö° [AI Makerspace](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ai-maker-space?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) ‚Äì where we build, ship, and share AI innovations. ‚ö° [Women In Product](https://www.linkedin.com/company/women-in-product?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) ‚Äì building amazing solutions that drive real impact. ‚ö° [Formula.Monks](https://www.linkedin.com/company/formulamonks?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) ‚Äì pushing boundaries in AI-driven creativity.
content:
When I started the [[AI Makerspace](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ai-maker-space?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text)] AI Engineering Bootcamp, I barely had hands-on AI experience. Ten weeks later, I walked out not just with knowledge of advanced RAG pipelines, retrieval strategies, and evaluation frameworks‚Äîbut with something far more valuable: confidence.
Confidence that I can take an idea, build it, deploy it, and keep improving it. Confidence that I can own the entire lifecycle of an AI application. That‚Äôs life-changing.
But here‚Äôs the real story ‚¨áÔ∏è
Our cohort was the largest ever‚Äî70 people. Out of 60 semifinalists, only 18 advanced to the final demo day. I finished 19th. Just one spot away.
Was I disappointed? Of course. But I didn‚Äôt stop preparing. I worked on my slides, rehearsed my pitch, and told myself: act as if you‚Äôre going to present anyway.
Then‚Äî4 hours before demo day‚ÄîI got the call: ‚ÄúSomeone dropped out. You‚Äôre next. Want to present?‚Äù
Because I never stopped preparing, I said yes without hesitation. And I presented Verityn AI, the co-pilot for auditors ‚Äî replacing weeks of manual document grind with instant, reliable compliance intelligence.
That moment hit me hard:
‚ö°Ô∏è The line between ‚Äúluck‚Äù and ‚Äúhard work‚Äù is razor thin.
‚ö°Ô∏è Luck favors those who stay ready.
‚ö°Ô∏è Perseverance creates opportunity.
I‚Äôm deeply grateful to the instructors [üë®üè´ü§ñ "Dr. Greg" Loughnane](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gregloughnane?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) and [Chris "The Wiz ü™Ñ" Alexiuk](https://ca.linkedin.com/in/csalexiuk?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text), judges, peer supporters and peers who pushed me and supported me. The certification is proof of the work‚Äîbut the mindset shift is the real reward.
üëâ If you‚Äôre hesitating to start something new‚ÄîAI, tech, or any passion‚Äîdon‚Äôt wait for perfect timing. Begin. Stay ready. And when the door cracks open, you‚Äôll be ready to walk through it.
This is just the onramp. The real journey of building, shipping, and sharing with the AI community is only beginning.
üí¨ If you‚Äôre curious about the bootcamp, exploring AI, or just thinking about starting fresh in a new field, I‚Äôd be glad to share my experience.
[#AI](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fai&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) [#Engineering](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fengineering&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) [#Bootcamp](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fbootcamp&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) [#Perseverance](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fperseverance&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) [#Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedi

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineering Bootcamp | Ironhack Remote
snippet: Prepare for your first junior role as an **AI Engineer, AI Software Engineer, AI Solution Specialist, AI Prompt Engineer**(among many others! ) by learning key in-demand skills. By the end of the bootcamp you¬¥ll be able to use LLMs to make AI understand emotions in text, get exactly the answers you want from AI tools like ChatGPT, and wield the key data handling skills used by real AI professionals every day. Get bootcamp-ready and hit the ground running with 40 hours of essential training. **No matter your previous tech knowledge** (or lack of it), our prework makes sure every Ironhacker is set up for success.
content:
Choose your bootcamp
It's time to start your journey. Pick your immersive bootcamp and take the first step...
Choose your class
Click the button to choose your course
Dive into the world of AI and become a super-powered AI Developer, no matter your aptitude for math! Learn how to integrate AI models like ChatGPT to build your own chatbot, and launch your tech career.
- Learn-by-doing with a comprehensive curriculum that gets you job-ready.
- Industry and market-focused career support up to one year after graduation.
- Graduate with a github portfolio full of projects tackling real-world problems.
- 24/7 support with a dedicated expert instructor, your peers, and an AI chatbot.

Course contents
Prepare for your first junior role as an AI Engineer, AI Software Engineer, AI Solution Specialist, AI Prompt Engineer (among many others!) by learning key in-demand skills. By the end of the bootcamp you¬¥ll be able to use LLMs to make AI understand emotions in text, get exactly the answers you want from AI tools like ChatGPT, and wield the key data handling skills used by real AI professionals every day.
PROGRESS 25%
No tech experience? No problem!
Get bootcamp-ready and hit the ground running with 40 hours of essential training. No matter your previous tech knowledge (or lack of it), our prework makes sure every Ironhacker is set up for success. Start prepping as early as four weeks before the bootcamp.
